overview: “Motorcycle Drive By” is a Third Eye Blind deep cut: a cult favorite song, beloved by fans, but overlooked by the public at large. This documentary explores a multi-platinum band through one of their most enduring tracks, and features incredible live performances and an intimate acoustic rendition of the song performed where it was originally conceived. Hang backstage to hear from the song's creators about the tune's origin, and unravel the secret to its longevity. Motorcycle Drive By is a chance to see where it all began, while looking forward to a prolific band's future.
tagline: A Film About Third Eye Blind
title: Motorcycle Drive By
